name: Block Puzzle
description:
👍Block Puzzle Jewel Classic - A popular and addictive puzzle game！

Once you start, you will never stop!

❤️Offline and FREE game! Play anytime, anywhere!
❤️Kill time when waiting for friend!
❤️Relax and be far away from stress!

👉How to play?
- Drag jewel blocks to place them in the board.
- The line will be cleared if it's full vertically or horizontally.
- Game will be over if there is no room for more blocks.

👉Why choose us?
- No WiFi needed.
- LEVEL mode: 500 levels! Can you pass Level 55?
- CLASSIC mode: Eliminate as many as you can!
- Wonderful blocks: Rotation! Bomb! Ice jewel!
- Leaderboard: Allow you to play with friends around the world.
